subject: CNN Alerts: bush
body:
CNN Alerts: bush






 



Alert Name: bush
Gore reportedly won't appear with Colombian leader

04/20/07 09:36 AM, EDT
Former U.S. Vice President Al Gore withdrew from an environmental conference Friday in Miami, Florida, and Colombian President Alvaro Uribe said Gore had pulled out to avoid appearing with Uribe, who is battling new accusations that he aided far-right death squads.
FULL STORY
